casebody.data:
Larry Edward ADAMS, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Kerry Louise Earley, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Timothy Filson, Warden; and Adam P. Laxalt, Attorney General of Nevada, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76239 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 14, 2018

DENIED.
